extension.description: Netball Live allows you to use you Free Telstra Live Pass to stream live matches, match replays, and other videos offered by this service. Note: this add-on is not compatible with passes obtained via in-app purchase.
extension.news:
[B]Version v1.2.1[/B] - Fix livepass login
[B]Version v1.2.0[/B] - Fix other videos - Fix live matches
[B]Version v1.1.2[/B] - Fix automatically removing login ticket if expired
[B]Version v1.1.1[/B] - Add travis.yml - update version no. - Minor overhaul, using aussieaddonscommon
[B]Version v1.1.0[/B] - Initial version
